name: uneq2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cun(c2, c0), cun(c2, c1)))

stmt.origin: 3eqtr4g(cun(c2, c0), cun(c2, c1), cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c2), wceq(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cun(c2, c0), cun(c2, c1)))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(cun(c2, c0), cun(c0, c2))
-| wceq(cun(c2, c1), cun(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cun(c2, c0), cun(c2, c1)))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c2)))
-| wceq(cun(c2, c0), cun(c0, c2))
-| wceq(cun(c2, c1), cun(c1, c2))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cun(c0, c2), cun(c1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cun(c2, c0), cun(c2, c1)))
-| wceq(cun(c2, c0), cun(c0, c2))
-| wceq(cun(c2, c1), cun(c1, c2))

|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cun(c2, c0), cun(c2, c1)))
-| wceq(cun(c2, c1), cun(c1, c2))
|- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cun(c2, c0), cun(c2, c1)))

comment: Equality theorem for the union of two classes. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
